author: Noodlemire
long_description:
Adds functions to override and unregister entities.

entitycontrol.override_entity(name, definition): override an entity with the given name, by providing new values in the definition table.

entitycontrol.unregister_entity(name): Unregister the given entity
name: entitycontrol
short_description: Adds functions to override and unregister entities.
title: Entity Control Function Library
